title: Tech startups struggle to get out of the red amid mktg and staff cost spike - Business Standard
content: Tech startups struggle to get out of the red amid mktg and staff cost spike  Business Standard
description: While losses widened by 45% and 55% at fintech peers Paytm and PB Fintech, respectively, food delivery firm Zomato remained in the red despite narrowing its net loss by 81%
